About Game

  • Story
  • SKIN AND GEAR
  • GAME CHALLENGES

The Maverick space station was a top-secret Strider project.

All employees who were allowed on the station were thoroughly vetted by the security services. To ensure complete secrecy, Maverick employees wore impenetrable suits with visors so they couldn't see each other's faces. The most significant developments took place in shaft Z1, divided into levels for different access levels.

A red threat level in Maverick means only one thing - employees must evacuate independently. Rocket packs have been made for all employees to leave the facility alone. You need to survive and get out. And remember - you have to hurry. Time is running out fast.

Play 11 unique limited edition characters. All models are unique

All characters have their unique agility level, allowing you to move more smoother. There also will be 11 types of gear available in the game, which players will use to get out of the space station shaft. Each rocketpack has its speed characteristics.   

The higher the quality of the jetpack, the greater its speed rating. Complete the set of the hero and the gear and start escaping the station to earn rewards.

Battle with other players for the title of the best survivor

Get tokens for every game you participate in. The higher you get during one game, the more prizes will be distributed. Receive rewards for making it to the top of the leaderboard.

  • Massive marketing support

John Jones

faq

Is it free to play?
Yes, you don’t need anything to start playing Rocket Rush. There is a gift rocket ready for everybody!
General token info?
Huge amount of customers pay for services by credit card. Not only Tiponline helps personnel and specialists to get their tips and increase their income, also we provide a high-quality and transparent service, where each user can accept money immediately to his card, quickly withdraw money, track payments, view the transaction history.
When does rewards for gear holders activate?
Auto-staking will activate after the purchase of the skin and rocket automatically.
Do I need to play to continue generating rewards?
No, you don’t have anything for the auto-staking, except coming online daily and proceeding the action of “evacuation”.
WIll the APYs change in future?
Our token is an alive ecosystem which will face events like token launch and burning. Thus, APY will change in the future. Check our whitepaper for more info.
Any promotions/marketing planned?
Marketing/partnerships will begin with collaborations with YouTubers & influencers and lining up various call channels & AMA channels. There are plans to include $RRUSH on multiple DEXes & will establish partnerships for that. We also expect a strong marketing campaign on Google and AppStore in-game product-placement commercials. Our goal is to make the game popular and widely recognizable
How far do the teams’ plans go?
We look forward to expanding the popularity of Rocket Rush game and expect huge attention to it in long-term runs. We also have scheduled several events on burning and releasing tokens planned for years ahead to support $RRUSH emission.
